Polymath Ventures | Bogotá, Colombia (Latin America) | Full-stack developer | Full-time | On-site | Visa | https://polymathv.com

Polymath Ventures is a company builder designed for emerging markets. We build innovative, game-changing companies that serve the needs of the fast-growing middle class. We are currently looking for passionate and talented full-stack developers that are hungry to learn and grow at 3 of our high impact ventures:

Autolab - https://autolab.com.co/ Táximo - http://www.taximo.co/ Elenas - https://elenas.la/

Interested in learning more? https://jobs.polymathv.com/5c70f1cc1

Tech stack: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PostgreSQL, Python, PHP, Java, Ruby
